channel.title: I need help
channel.description:
Some way to get clarity, to stop my mind reverting back every 30 minutes to a sex-filled idiot.
After orgasm I find myself totally at peace with the world, I can think clearly! I have - CLARITY.
So why is it 30 minutes later I cannot think like I could straight after orgasm? This sucks! I want to go back to how it was before I was 12 or so. Back then I didn't have my mind filled with this shit about women and sex.
Somebody help me =[

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:57, topic:251552”][quote author=goatee link=topic=332067.msg2595016#msg2595016 date=1229950315]

So everytime i need clarity i just have sex with my girlfriend…

Yeh, cos having sex with retards really helps me concentrate too.

BTW you finally stop puberty at like 21, then the hormones slowly decrease. But tbh I don’t think you get less fertile, there are 50 years olds who fuck like mad!
[/quote]

You don’t have to be fertile to have sex. A man without balls can fuck just as good as a man with balls, but the man without balls won’t get any kids.[/quote]

i beg to differ… my balls always seem to slap against the ass of the chick im banging and at certain points i have to slow down cause there slapping too hard and start to hurt my precious balls.

I figure without balls, i could go harder for longer without the worry of bruising my balls on the chicks ass.

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:46, topic:251552”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=332067.msg2599553#msg2599553 date=1230152155]
Okay I went a good 2 days without fapping, and I seem to be able to concentrate better so I’m going to keep it to 2-3 days between fapping.

=D
[/quote]
But if you don’t fap, won’t you feel that you need a fap all the time?[/quote]

Fact: If you are a smoker, and are cutting back on smoking, you will feel that you need to smoke all the time.

So logically, once he does it for a while, it’ll start to get easier.

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

On another topic

Are you gay? I love those thoughts

I’m not gay, and sure I enjoy them, but that time spent thinking about that sorta stuff, which I can’t seem to get my mind off of, could be spent learning new skills etc.

I’m going to try what a few of you guys said and not fap for a few days and try to limit myself to only fapping every few days. Sounds like it should work!

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:37, topic:251552”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=332067.msg2596965#msg2596965 date=1230030295]

This is what alcoholics call a moment of clarity. I guess masturbators could also call it that.

Davidude36, you could use Lothy’s approach at sudden lolineedtofucksomeone moments, and punish the Kangaroo.
[/quote]
Amirite?

I don’t have any pets. :rolleyes:

I’m sorry, I was confused with your mother. They look the same!

…anyway I don’t see what is so hard to just go and watch porn. If you’re at school, pull a Superbad, flip your boner up into your belly button.

I don’t mind having a stiffy, it’s different to how you think. I am already fapping when I feel I need to. I was asking more if there is something else I could do like say cut my balls off.

Hurr durr[/quote]

I sort of had the same problem and I did what yz did, I just went without fapping for 4 days and it helped a ton, I fap maybe 2 times a week, at tops, and my clarity is improved a ton and, I also am no longer NEAR as horny as I was before.

Also to popular belief, getting laid every time you get a stiffy doesn’t help it too much, it just makes it go away longer in my personal opinion.

Read full topic
